sect2.title: Contents
sect2.para: Major programs in kdeedu include flashkard, kalzium, kbruch, keduca, khangman, kig, kiten, klettres, kmathtool, kmessedwords, kmplot, kpercentage, kstars, ktouch, kverbos and kvoctrain.

sect3.title: kalzium
sect3.para: kalzium is a program which shows you the Periodic System of Elements.

sect3.title: kbruch
sect3.para: kbruch is a small program to generate tasks with fractions.

sect3.title: khangman
sect3.para: khangman is the classical hangman game for children, adapted for KDE.

sect3.title: kig
sect3.para: kig is a KDE application for Interactive Geometry.

sect3.title: kiten
sect3.para: kiten is a Japanese reference/study tool for KDE.

sect3.title: kmessedwords
sect3.para: kmessedwords is a simple mind-training word game.

sect3.title: kmplot
sect3.para: kmplot is a mathematical function plotter for KDE.

sect3.title: kpercentage
sect3.para: kpercentage is a small math application that will help pupils to improve their skills in calculating percentages.

sect3.title: ktouch
sect3.para: ktouch is a touch typing tutor.

sect3.title: kverbos
sect3.para: kverbos is an application specially designed to study Spanish verbforms.
